title: Trump’s EPA Issues $100 Million Grant to Flint Michigan To Fix Water System
text:
Tillerson Convinces Chinese to Help With NK, Did What Hillary and Kerry Failed to Do for 8 Years 
Cue Trump’s EPA. 
“The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency … today awarded a $100 million grant to the Michigan Department of Environmental Quality to fund drinking water infrastructure upgrades in Flint, Michigan,” the EPA announced in a statement published Friday. 
“The people of Flint and all Americans deserve a more responsive federal government,” the statement quoted EPA Administrator Scott Pruitt as having said. “EPA will especially focus on helping Michigan improve Flint’s water infrastructure as part of our larger goal of improving America’s water infrastructure.”   
Yet apparently nobody at MSNBC — known for its especially hilarious brand of fake news — received the memo, because on Sunday the outlet ran a piece about the president’s intention to “defund environmental justice at EPA.” Trump budget would defund Environmental Justice at EPA https://t.co/zHXeQqQMjI pic.twitter.com/ScOgD5ZWus 
— MSNBC (@MSNBC) March 19, 2017 
They never learn, do they? Mind you, MSNBC was not the only network to play these games. 
In a report published Friday, CNN noted that the money for Flint had actually been earmarked and approved by the administration of former President Barack Obama. While this was true, the network neglected to mention that “Trump’s EPA had to still make the final approval of the funds,” according to Red State .
